body.name: Columbia Women's Suttle Mountain Long Insulated Jacket
features: OMNI-HEAT: Our patented Heat Reflective garments are the ultimate body heat management system for outdoor performance. The interior lining consists of our metallic dot pattern designed to retain heat, while the breathable fabric dissipates moisture.

100% SYNTHETIC DOWN INSULATION: The down-style baffling is flexible at all the right points, controlling loft, versatile fit, and maximum warmth. The lush faux-fur trimmed hood protects the head and face while containing your natural body heat.

SHERPA LINED HOOD: This stylish winter parka comes with an adjustable storm hood, lined with plush sherpa fleece, a soft chin guard, and removable faux-fur trim. Now you can definitely dial in the cozy with the changing winter conditions.
HANDY FEATURES: With a full two-way zippered front, adjustable cuffs, a zippered chest pocket, along with two hand and cargo pockets to keep valuables warm and secure.

BUILT TO LAST: Columbia’s attention to detail is what sets our apparel apart from others. We use only the highest quality materials, expert craftsmanship, and durable stitching. This is a worry-free garment you will enjoy for seasons to come.
body.description: The Columbia Suttle Mountain Long Insulated Jacket combines stylish looks with functional technology to keep you warm and dry. Made for women, this jacket features a water resistant shell, insulated with warm synthetic down, along with a faux fur trimmed hood, you'll actually enjoy heading out into the harsh elements with this jacket. The quality assembly, construction, and stitching infused into this jacket will instill a sense of confidence when the weather turns super blustery and cold. This versatile parka-style jacket features a water repellent shell, that infuses 100% synthetic down, and is lined with our signature Omni-HEAT thermal reflective lining — delivering winter performance you'll truly enjoy on any frigid outing. It comes with an adjustable sherpa-lined storm hood, with its own removable and stowable faux fur trim. Now you can tailor your cozy on the go. The two-way adjustable center-front zipper allows complete adjustability for improved range of motion and temperature control, while a zippered chest pocket, adjustable cuffs, and two hand and cargo pockets will keep your essentials secure and dry. This women's winter coat is offered in multiple colors and sizes. Available in extended sizing. Active and Regular Fit. To ensure the size you choose is right, utilize our sizing chart and the following measurement instructions: For the sleeves, start at the center back of your neck and measure across the shoulder and down to the sleeve. If you come up with a partial number, round up to the next even number. For the chest, measure at the fullest part of the chest, under the armpits and over the shoulder blades, keeping the tape measure firm and level.How To Measure: Chest/Bust: Measure at the fullest part of the chest, under the armpits and over the shoulder blades, keeping the tape measure firm and level. Waist: Measure around the natural waistline, allowing the tape measure to sit comfortably.Hips: Measure around the fullest part of your hips.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #7,684 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry) #11 in Women's Insulated Shells

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars One of the best Parkas to Purchase
reviews.reviewText: As the colder seasons come by it was nice to get this parka for my wife who isn't use to the North Eastern winters. She's from a warmer country and this help her get through the winter. The olive green color is stylish and fits well with different types of palettes. It is quite durable and not that heavy for the size and functionality of it. The foil material inside helps insulate the body heat well and no cold air comes through. Great for winter hikes and walking in the city with wind blow at you. Definitely considering to get another one for her and I. Recommend this to any one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’ve used the same Marmot brand winter jacket for years.. but, after being washed like a bazillion times (it was white), it was finally starting to show its wear. I was apprehensive to give this one a try, but the price was hard to beat. I have to say, I am pleasantly surprised! I live in west Michigan and warmth is my biggest need in a jacket. This one definitely helps retain heat/block the cold winds, is comfortable, functional, and cute! It fits true to size. I’m especially pleased with the length. I am tall and sometimes struggle with clothing lengths, not the case with this jacket! Would recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits my curvy figure
reviews.reviewText: After trying on, and looking for many many Parkas, this one fit my curvy, pear shape. It is super warm, zips up and down comfortably. I like the extra snaps for a super warm closure with the zipper or just a quick snap closure. The color is more of a muted black, but I still like it ..it just surprised me. The hood has a Velcro strap in the back which makes it more manageable if you just want a little bit covering you or if you really want to lose your head in it. It’s not too heavy compared to many that I tried on and the longer length is also a bonus as it doesn’t cut right as the widest part of the thigh. The sleeves are very long but I was able to fold them back inside and they stay fine. That would be the only drawback unless you like that look. Overall, I’m super happy with this coat for an amazing price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soooo warm and flattering!!
reviews.reviewText: Where to even start with this review…. This coat is AH-MAZING!! I haven’t worn it once without someone complimenting it. It’s the perfect color, matches with everything. The length is perfect, exactly what I was looking for. I’ve never had a down filled jacket and let’s just say, I don’t think i can go back. It is incredibly warm. The hood is also so so warm. You will not be disappointed with this jacket.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Warm Coat - Runs Small
reviews.reviewText: This is great for an Ohio winter. I like that the coat goes down to my knees for added warmth. The lining is reflective which I really thinks help preserve body heat when the coat is zipped up. The colors look nice with the navy and white/grey trim. I like the fleece lined hood, I hate wearing hats and this worked well with ear miffs. I like that the faux fur is removable and that the hood is adjustable.The con is the sizing, it is very straight and it tighter around the hip are for me. The sleeves are also a little long. It also makes noise, which some people do not like.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This coat is amazing! I absolutely love it! The fit is perfect (I always have to size up in Columbia and I have broad shoulders), the zipper is smooth, its light weight and the color is exactly what I expected. This jacket really does keep you warm (i'm always freezing so the lining on the inside is what sold me on this coat) and is beyond comfortable and flattering! It's 110% worth the money, you get exactly what you pay for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Coat - really cool features - and light-weight
reviews.reviewText: This coat was sent to me without me ordering it - have no idea how it happened, but the coat fit our daughter perfectly (she's 6'3" tall and has very long arms). She really needed a new coat - and she fell in love with this coat when she saw it. So, it became a Christmas present. It's been extremely cold where we live (-15 degrees with wind chills -30) - she says this coat has kept her toasty warm without layering or anything. She loves the coat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this jacket! It is nice and warm. I will say, if you have hips, size up. It is straight fitting, so it is hard to zip with my hips sometimes and rides up.

The media could not be loaded. La compré para ir a esquiar, tuve mis dudas, pero sinceramente fue una gran compra, la chamarra no es tan estorbosa como otras, tiene tecnología omni heat que te mantiene calientito, además venía en bolsa de Columbia y traía las etiquetas originales con el precio real, que sinceramente era mucho más elevado de lo que yo pagué en Amazon. Lo único que puedo decir para que tomen en consideración es que en efecto viene muy grande, yo use una térmica, y otra polar arriba y arriba de todo eso esta chamarra y aún así me quedaba grande, de las mandas tuve que doblar porque si está muy larga también, como referencia mido 1.80 peso 78 kgSinceramente creo que esta chamarra luce mejor para personas altas, si eres chaparrita y por el volumen adicional que genera la chamarra, no creo que te vaya a gustar mucho, espero les sirva ✌️

It's stinks. Dehors quelques instants et je gèle comme un oisillon! J'exige un remboursement et si nécessaire un retour aux frais du commerçant. Au surplus, la toile est légèrement abimée. Evelyne Cote, Lawyer-Translator.
Muy buena calidad! Abrigadora y la talla corresponde.

The Columbia Suttle Mountain Long Insulated Jacket is a winter game-changer. Its sleek design combines fashion with functionality, offering a flattering fit while keeping me warm in chilly temperatures. The insulation is just right—providing coziness without bulk. The extended length adds extra protection, and the durable materials make it a go-to choice for various winter activities. With Columbia's reputation for quality, this jacket seamlessly blends style and warmth, making it a staple in my cold-weather wardrobe. 5 out of 5!
La chamarra es hermosa el color gris me fascinó, me quedo grande y la tuve que devolver pero sin duda es excelente.
